body:
Based on #17929.
Related to #18579.

Adds the linker flags required to turn on link time garbage collection
to the win and linux gitian descriptors. --print-gc-sections is added
for testing so the garbage collection is dumped to the build log.

Note that this is just for test purposes. Passing `--gc-sections` alone is enough to invoke some savings. `--gc-section` support for PE in `ld` still seems fairly experimental.

Binary size comparisons from some local testing:

Depends: `make -C depends/ NO_QT=1 NO_WALLET=1 NO_UPNP=1 NO_ZMQ=1`.

#### master
`./configure --prefix=/bitcoin/depends/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu1`

| binary | build | build + strip |
| - | - | - | 
| bitcoind | 6896352 | 5645408 |
| bitcoin-cli | 1297600 | 1088320 |

#### --gc-sections
`./configure --prefix=/bitcoin/depends/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu LDFLAGS="-Wl,--gc-sections -Wl,--print-gc-sections"`

| binary | build | build + strip |
| - | - | - | 
| bitcoind | 6867088 | 5624896 |
| bitcoin-cli | 1277680 | 1071936 |

#### --gc-sections + ffunction-sections
`./configure --prefix=/bitcoin/depends/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu LDFLAGS="-Wl,--gc-sections -Wl,--print-gc-sections" CXXFLAGS="-ffunction-sections -fdata-sections"`

| binary | build | build + strip |
| - | - | - | 
| bitcoind | 6481760 | 5333984 |
| bitcoin-cli | 732864 | 596704 |

Something for the bot to chew on overnight.
title: [WIP] build: Link time garbage collection
